member.name: M:Bazam.WebSockets.BazamWebSocket.Create(System.String)
member.param: The URI of the WebSocket server.

member.name: M:Bazam.WebSockets.BazamWebSocket.OnConnected(System.Action{Bazam.WebSockets.BazamWebSocket})
member.summary: Set the Action to call when the connection has been established.

member.name: M:Bazam.WebSockets.BazamWebSocket.OnDisconnect(System.Action{Bazam.WebSockets.BazamWebSocket})
member.summary: Set the Action to call when the connection has been terminated.

member.name: M:Bazam.WebSockets.BazamWebSocket.OnMessage(System.Action{System.String,Bazam.WebSockets.BazamWebSocket})
member.summary: Set the Action to call when a messages has been received.

member.name: M:Bazam.WebSockets.BazamWebSocket.SendMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Send a message to the WebSocket server.
